# Testing the loading of the packages for the future sample

```{r}
#| warning: true
#| output: true
rm(list = ls())

library(ggplot2); library(dplyr); library(brms)
library(here) #for finding the root directory
library(beepr) #alerting for when modelling is completed
```

# Testing the brms library

```{r}
set.seed(123)

#Simulated Data
n <- 100
x <- rnorm(n)
y <- 1.5 + 2 * x + rnorm(n, sd = 1)

#dataframe
dat <- data.frame(x = x, y = y)

#Fitting Data
fit <- brm(y ~ x, data = dat, family = gaussian(), chains = 2, iter = 1000)
```

## Summary
```{r}
summary(fit)
```

## Plotted Graph
```{r}
plot(fit)
```
